All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, org.apache.wicket.IClusterable, org.apache.wicket.IConverterLocator, org.apache.wicket.markup.html.IHeaderContributor, org.apache.wicket.markup.html.IHeaderPartContainerProvider
@AuthorizeInstantiation(value="STUDENT")
public class StarPanel
extends org.apache.wicket.markup.html.panel.Panel
implements org.apache.wicket.markup.html.IHeaderContributor

Basic Star Rating Panel This is essentially both a ResponseEditor and ResponseViewer for a ResponseType.STAR_RATING.

See Also:
Serialized Form

public StarPanel(String id,

Constructor. If the model object is null, this component will be invisible. TODO: This hiding behavior is not ideal or expected. Only used because this is both a viewer and editor.
